about_the_game:
This is an additional content set that can be used in the game.

■ Character modeling
・ 《Lolita Expedition》, the early generation of "Hua Yin" in 2008, includes two character shapes, "original" and "repainted".
■ Combat gain
・ Gain twice the experience in battle.
・ Get twice the gold coins in battle.
・ Gain 2 times of AP value in battle.


Collect it in the room of Dream Court.

※ After downloading, you can get the specials in the in-game store.
※ Only the latest version can be used.
detailed_description:
This is an additional content set that can be used in the game.

■ Character modeling
・ 《Lolita Expedition》, the early generation of "Hua Yin" in 2008, includes two character shapes, "original" and "repainted".
■ Combat gain
・ Gain twice the experience in battle.
・ Get twice the gold coins in battle.
・ Gain 2 times of AP value in battle.


Collect it in the room of Dream Court.

※ After downloading, you can get the specials in the in-game store.
※ Only the latest version can be used.
name: Lolita Expedition - Initial Commemorative Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 2000 / XP / Vista
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 2000 / XP / Vista
  • Processor: PC with 2.0GHz Intel® Pentium®4 equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: Role commemorative modeling and double combat rewards
